import React from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; export default ({ car }) => { let {carId} = useParams(); return (
Free shipping

{car.mark}

{car.model}

${car.price + 1500}

${car.price}

This offer is valid until the final of the current month or as long as stock lasts!

50+ in stock
); };
